Ancient Power.card_desc: [Overcharge] Reduce the Cooldown of Blitz Upper by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy hit while Overcharge is active.

Antediluvian.card_desc: [Overcharge] Increase the duration of Overcharge by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Carry through.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after hitting an enemy with Blitz Upper.

Daredevil.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Heal for {scale=70|70} after activating Blitz Upper.

Dark Vision.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Generate {scale=5|5}% Ultimate charge after getting a Killing Blow with Blitz Upper.

Eternal.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Increase the duration of Rune of Travel by {scale=1|1}s.

Evanescent.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% while Rune of Travel is active.

Faustian Bargain.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.

Guts.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=6|6}% while at or below 40% Health.

Inner Strength.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Reset the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper when you Teleport using Rune of Travel.

Nothing Personal.card_desc: [True Power] Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 15% and enemies at or below 65% Health are Revealed to you.

Perseverance.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal while at or below 40% Health.

Primeval Might.card_desc: [Overcharge] Gain {scale=8|8}% Lifesteal while Overcharge is active.

Reclamation.card_desc: [Overcharge] Reduce the Cooldown of Overcharge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Relic Affinity.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Generate {scale=4|4} Ammo for each enemy hit with Blitz Upper.

Revitalize.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Heal for {scale=100|100} after Teleporting to your Rune of Travel.

Transient.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Reduce the cooldown of Rune of Travel by {scale=1|1}s.

Ausdauer.card_desc: [Waffe] Bei 40% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub.

Courage.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 40% oder weniger Gesundheit wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Draufg\u00e4nger.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Nach Aktivierung von Kinnhaken wirst du {scale=70|70} LP geheilt.

Dunkle Vision.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Todesstöße mit Kinnhaken laden deine Überkraft um {scale=5|5}% auf.

Durchreise.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Rune der Reise um {scale=1|1}s.

Ewigkeit.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Erhöht die Dauer von Rune der Reise um {scale=1|1}s.

Innere St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Nach der Teleportation mit Rune der Reise wird die Abklingzeit von Kinnhaken und Überladung zurückgesetzt.

Nichts Pers\u00f6nliches.card_desc: [Wahre Stärke] Ziele mit 65% oder weniger Gesundheit werden dir offenbart. Deine Überkraft lädt 15% schneller auf.

Reklamation.card_desc: [Überladung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Überladung um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Reliktaffinit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Für jeden mit Kinnhaken getroffenen Gegner wird {scale=4|4} Munition erzeugt.

Revitalisierung.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Nach der Teleportation mit Rune der Reise wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Teufelspakt.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Rune der Reise wird nicht mehr automatisch aktiviert. Wird die Rune nicht verwendet, wird die Abklingzeit zurückgesetzt.

Uralte Macht.card_desc: [Überladung] Für jeden während Überladung getroffenen Gegner reduziert sich die Abklingzeit von Kinnhaken um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Urzeitliche Kraft.card_desc: [Überladung] Während Überladung aktiv ist, erhältst du {scale=8|8}% Lebensraub.

Verschwindend.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Rune der Reise um {scale=8|8}%.

Vollzug.card_desc: [Kinnhaken] Nach Treffern mit Kinnhaken erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Vorsintflutlich.card_desc: [Überladung] Erhöht die Dauer von Überladung um {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Cran.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 40% de PV, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

\u00c9ph\u00e9m\u00e8re.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] La Rune de mobilité se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

\u00c9ternit\u00e9.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] La Rune de mobilité dure {scale=1|1}s de plus.

\u00c9vanescence.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}% tant que la Rune de mobilité est active.

Force int\u00e9rieure.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Se téléporter sur la Rune de mobilité réinitialise le temps de recharge d'Uppercut éclair et de Surcharge.

Fougue.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Jusqu'au bout.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s si vous touchez au moins un ennemi avec Uppercut éclair.

March\u00e9 de Faust.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] La Rune de mobilité ne s'active pas automatiquement à la fin de l'effet. Son temps de recharge n'est pas activé le cas échéant.

Pers\u00e9v\u00e9rance.card_desc: [Arme] En dessous de 40% de PV, vous avez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie.

Pouvoir ancestral.card_desc: [Surcharge] Le temps de recharge d'Uppercut éclair diminue de {scale=0.5|0.5}s par ennemi touché pendant Surcharge.

Prise de risque.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Uppercut éclair vous rend {scale=70|70} PV.

Puissance primaire.card_desc: [Surcharge] Vous avez {scale=8|8}% de drain de vie pendant Surcharge.

Reliquat.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Vous regagnez {scale=4|4} munitions par ennemi touché avec Uppercut éclair.

Revitalisation.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] Se téléporter sur la Rune de mobilité vous redonne {scale=100|100} PV.

Rien de personnel.card_desc: [Puissance révélée] Les ennemis qui ont moins de 65% de PV vous sont révélés. La vitesse de chargement de Puissance révélée augmente de 15%.

Vision lugubre.card_desc: [Uppercut éclair] Chaque exécution avec Uppercut éclair donne {scale=5|5}% de charge d'ultime.

\u5185\u5728\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [传送符文] 使用传送符文会重置过载和闪电直击的冷却时间

\u5192\u5931\u9b3c.card_desc: [闪电直击] 使用闪电直击后回复{scale=70|70}点生命值

\u521a\u6bc5.card_desc: [武器] 生命值低于40%时获得{scale=10|10}%的生命偷取

\u56de\u6536.card_desc: [过载] 过载的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒。

\u590d\u539f.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送后回复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u592a\u53e4\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [过载] 技能激活期间获得{scale=8|8}%的生命偷取

\u6c38\u6052.card_desc: [传送符文] 符文持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u6d6e\u58eb\u5fb7\u5951\u7ea6.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送符文不再持续时间结束后自动传送。若没有手动激活传送，则技能冷却时间重置。

\u77ac\u606f.card_desc: [传送符文] 传送符文冷却时间减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u79c1\u4eba\u6069\u6028.card_desc: [真正的力量] 大招充能速率增加{scale=12.75|.75}%，并且生命值低于65%的敌人会对你显形

\u8001\u673d.card_desc: [过载] 被过载击中的敌人3秒内治疗效果减少{scale=15|15}%

\u80c6\u91cf.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于40%时受到的伤害减少{scale=6|6}%

\u8f6c\u77ac\u5373\u901d.card_desc: [传送符文] 放置传送符文后，移动速度增加{scale=8|8}%

\u8fdc\u53e4\u529b\u91cf.card_desc: [过载] 过载时击中敌人减少闪电直击{scale=0.5|0.5}秒冷却时间

\u9057\u8ff9\u4e4b\u7cfb.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击每命中一个敌人会获得{scale=4|4}发弹药

\u987a\u5229\u8fc7\u5173.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击命中敌人后3秒内移动速度增加{scale=10|10}%

\u9ed1\u6697\u89c6\u754c.card_desc: [闪电直击] 闪电直击命中的敌人会显形{scale=1|1}秒

Afinidad por reliquias.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Recuperas {scale=4|4} de munición por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Blitz aéreo.

Animado.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=8|8}%.

Antediluviano.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] La duración de Sobrecarga aumenta en {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Eterno.card_desc: [Runa viajera] La duración de la Runa Viajera aumenta en {scale=1|1} s.

Evanescente.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% mientras Viaje sombrío esté activa.

Fuerza interna.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Se reinicia la recarga de Sobrecarga y Blitz aéreo tras teletransportarte usando Runa viajera.

Fuerza primeva.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de robo de vida mientras Sobrecarga está activa.

Nada Personal.card_desc: [Poder real] El ritmo de recarga de tu habilidad definitiva aumenta un 15% y los enemigos con salud al 65% o menos te son revelados.

Persevera.card_desc: [Arma] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida cuando tu salud está al 40% o menos.

Poder prehist\u00f3rico.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Se reduce la recarga de Blitz aéreo en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo alcanzado mientras Sobrecarga está activa.

Reclamaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Sobrecarga] Se reduce la recarga de Sobrecarga en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Revitaliza.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS tras teletransportarte a tu Runa viajera.

Sobrellevar.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Blitz aéreo.

Temerario.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Te curas {scale=70|70} PS tras activar Blitz aéreo.

Transitorio.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Se reduce la recarga de la Runa Viajera en {scale=1|1} s.

Trato f\u00e1ustico.card_desc: [Runa viajera] Runa viajera ya no se activa automáticamente y, si Runa no se usa, la recarga se reinicia.

Tripas.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=6|6}% si tu salud está al 40% o menos.

Visi\u00f3n oscura.card_desc: [Blitz aéreo] Tu habilidad definitiva se recarga un {scale=5|5}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia con Blitz aéreo.

Afinidade com Rel\u00edquias.card_desc: [Pancada] Gera {scale=4|4} de munição a cada inimigo atingido com a Pancada.

Coragem.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=6|6}% o dano recebido enquanto estiver com 40% ou menos de vida.

Dem\u00f4nio Ousado.card_desc: [Pancada]  Você se cura em {scale=70|70} de vida após ativar Pancada.

Ef\u00eamero.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] O intervalo da Runa de Transporte é reduzido em {scale=1|1}s.

Espirituoso.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade em que recarrega a arma.

Eterno.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Aumenta em {scale=1|1}s a duração da Runa de Transporte.

Evanescente.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=8|8}% enquanto a Runa de Transporte estiver ativa.

For\u00e7a Interior.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Zera os intervalos do Disparo Energizado e da Pancada quando você se teleporta usando a Runa de Transporte.

Nada Pessoal.card_desc: [Poder Verdadeiro] Sua suprema carrega 15% mais rápido e inimigos com 65% ou menos de vida são revelados a você.

Obstina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida enquanto estiver com 40% ou menos de vida.

Pacto de Fausto.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] A Runa de Transporte não se ativa mais automaticamente e, se não for usada, seu intervalo é zerado.

Passando Atrav\u00e9s.card_desc: [Pancada] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 3s após acertar um inimigo com Pancada.

Poder Antigo.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Reduz o intervalo da Pancada em {scale=0.5|0.5}s para cada inimigo atingido com o Disparador Energizado.

Poder Primordial.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de roubo de vida enquanto o Disparador Energizado está ativo.

Pr\u00e9-diluviano.card_desc: [Disparo Energizado] A duração do Disparador Energizado aumenta em {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Reivindica\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparador Energizado] Reduz o intervalo do Disparador Energizado em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Revitaliza\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Você se cura em  {scale=100|100} de vida ao se teleportar usando a Runa de Transporte.

\u00daltimo Remanescente.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=4|4} a sua munição máxima.

Vis\u00e3o das Trevas.card_desc: [Pancada] Carrega {scale=5|5}% da sua suprema ao dar o golpe fatal com a Pancada.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Пока действует Руна путешествий, ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0412\u0435\u0447\u043d\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Длительность Руны путешествий повышается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0412\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Телепортация с помощью Руны путешествий перезаряжает Перегрузку и Стремительную атаку.

\u0412\u044b\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] При уровне здоровья 40% и ниже вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма.

\u0414\u043e \u0441\u0430\u043c\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Попадание по врагу Стремительной атакой повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043d\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Перегрузка] Пока действует Перегрузка, попадания по врагу сокращают перезарядку Стремительной атаки на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0415\u0434\u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Попадание по врагу Стремительной атакой генерирует {scale=4|4} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041c\u0443\u0436\u0435\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 40% и ниже входящий урон снижается на {scale=6|6}%.

\u041d\u0435\u0434\u043e\u043b\u0433\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Перезарядка Руны путешествий сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041d\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0433\u043e \u0.card_desc: [Истинная сила] Вам раскрывается местоположение целей с уровнем здоровья 65% и ниже, а ваш суперудар заряжается на 15% быстрее.

\u041e\u0436\u0438\u0432\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] После телепортации к Руне путешествий вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0432\u043e\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Перегрузка] Пока действует Перегрузка, вы получаете {scale=8|8}% вампиризма.

\u041f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=4|4} ед.

\u0421\u043e\u0440\u0432\u0438\u0433\u04.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Активация Стремительной атаки исцеляет вас на {scale=70|70} ед.

\u0422\u0435\u043c\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Стремительная атака] Нанесение смертельного удара Стремительной атакой заряжает суперудар на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0424\u0430\u0443\u0441\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Руна путешествий больше не активируется автоматически. Если вы не используете ее, она полностью перезарядится.

Cyrograf Fausta.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Runa podróży nie aktywuje się automatycznie i jeśli nie zostanie użyta, czas odnowienia zostanie zresetowany.

Efemeryda.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}%, gdy Runa podróży jest aktywna.

Kozak.card_desc: [Wzmacniacz ciosu] Aktywacja Wzmacniacza ciosu przywraca ci {scale=70|70} PZ.

Kura\u017c.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=6|6}%, jeśli twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 40% PZ.

Mroczna wizja.card_desc: [Wzmacniacz ciosu] Zapewnia {scale=5|5}% naładowania arcyzdolności, jeśli zadasz Zabójczy cios przy pomocy Wzmacniacza ciosu.

Odzyskanie.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Skraca czas odnowienia Przeciążenia o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

O\u017cywienie.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ po Teleportacji do twojej Runy podróży.

Pierwotna moc.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Zapewnia {scale=8|8}% kradzieży życia, gdy Przeciążenie jest aktywne.

Przebicie.card_desc: [Wzmacniacz ciosu] Trafienie wroga Wzmacniaczem ciosu zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Przedpotopowy.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Wydłuża czas trwania Przeciążenia o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Staro\u017cytna moc.card_desc: [Przeciążenie] Skraca czas odnowienia Wzmacniacza ciosu o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie wroga, gdy Przeciążenie jest aktywne.

To nic osobistego.card_desc: [Prawdziwa moc] Zwiększa tempo ładowania arcyzdolności o 15%, a cele mające 65% zdrowia lub mniej zostają ujawnione dla ciebie.

Ulotno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Skraca czas odnowienia Runy podróży o {scale=1|1} s.

Wewn\u0119trzna si\u0142a.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Resetuje czas odnowienia Przeciążenia i Wzmacniacza ciosu, kiedy teleportujesz się, korzystając z Runy podróży.

Wieczno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Wydłuża czas trwania Runy podróży o {scale=1|1} s.

Wsp\u00f3lnota relikwii.card_desc: [Wzmacniacz ciosu] Trafienie wroga Wzmacniaczem ciosu wytwarza {scale=4|4} szt. amunicji.

Wytrwa\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Zapewnia {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia, jeśli twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 40% PZ.

Antik G\u00fc\u00e7.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme etkinken vurduğun her düşman için Yumruklu Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Deli Fi\u015fek.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum'u etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=70|70} Can iyileş.

Diriltme.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü'ne Işınlandıktan sonra {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Eski Toprak.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme'nin süresini {scale=0.2|0.2} sn artır.

Fani.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü'nün Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Gelip Ge\u00e7i\u00e7i.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü etkinken Hareket Hızını %{scale=8|8} artır.

\u0130ade.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

\u0130lkel Kudret.card_desc: [Aşırı Yükleme] Aşırı Yükleme etkinken %{scale=8|8} Can Çalma kazan.

\u0130\u015f Tamam.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Karanl\u0131k G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Ultiyi %{scale=5|5} doldur.

Ki\u015fisel Alg\u0131lama.card_desc: [Gerçek Güç] Ulti dolum hızını %15 artır ve %65 veya altında Canı olan hedefler senin için açığa çıksın.

Metanet.card_desc: [Zırh] %40 Can veya altındayken aldığın hasarı %{scale=6|6} azalt.

\u00d6z Kuvvet.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü ile Işınlandığında Aşırı Yükleme ve Yumruklu Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini sıfırla.

Sebat.card_desc: [Silah] %40 Can veya altındayken %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazan.

\u015eeytanla Pazarl\u0131k.card_desc: [Yolculuk Rünü] Yolculuk Rünü artık otomatik olarak etkinleşmeyecek ve Rün kullanılmazsa bekleme süresi sıfırlanacak.

Yadigar Sevgisi.card_desc: [Yumruklu Hücum] Yumruklu Hücum ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=4|4} Cephane oluştur.
